properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
S/V EXPERIENCE SANK IN 18-38.05N 048-35.62W.
TWO PERSONS OVERBOARD, ONE PERSON IN LIFERAFT,
ORANGE AND BLACK. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024, PHONE: 5965 9670 9292.
